name: Red Lite, Green Lite
description: Are you ready for the most exciting and action packed game to ever hit the modern gayming industry? Red Lite, Green Lite is an intense competitive game where you and your friends (if any) race towards the finish line in order to get the W. Also, look out for the canoe... Who will emerge victorious and who will end up with the L? Download the game that btw doesnt have an installer, to find out!!
